title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the Project Properties Info page displays text fields with automatic borders that identify them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds, which makes them stand out even more.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should not use text fields on motif platforms. The text fields should be replaced with a different UI component that does not have automatic borders and has the same background color as the surrounding area.
SR:
1. Open the Project Properties dialog on a motif platform.
2. Navigate to the Info page.
3. Observe the appearance of the text fields with automatic borders and different colored backgrounds.
